title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Lecture Notes
text: I share my study notes, but with a twist: I re-write them in a more generalized, and highest level of abstract language but also provide intuitive explanations and concrete examples so u don’t drown. You’ll find pain in reading them but trust me it’s worth it (jk, I want u to suffer, hehe)

title: Lecture Notes
text:
Mathematics:

Mathematical Preliminaries: Logic, Proofs, Sets and Numbers.
Analysis I: Topology and Calculus of Functions of Single Real Variable.
Linear Algebra I: Algebraic structures of vector spaces, matrix theory and Eigen theory.
Mathematical Logic: Proof Theory and Computing with proof assistants (Coq).

title: Lecture Notes
text:
Mathematical Physics:

Classical Mechanics I: Newtonian, Lagrangian and Hamiltonian Formulations.

title: About
text: Yo! I’m an 18 y-o kido studying maths and mathematical physics. This blog is my “personal space”— a place where i share my passion for mathe and physics through my lecture notes, research articles and ideas, and topics that usually don’t make it to the classroom until the PhD level… hehe :3.
